name: SilverDrag0n
tagline: A Social Engineering toolkit for Kali Linux 2.0 and above
body:
### Welcome to SilverDrag0n.
SilverDrag0n is a java application made for pentesters and people who learn cyber & social engineering like me. It includes powerfull tools like apache2 & beef-xss framework handling for social engineering html.

### Requirements
Follow this two steps to get the program to run properly:
**1.** Use kali linux 2.0 and above to run the program.

**2.**Run it by navigating to it's location in the terminal and typing "java -jar SilverDrag0n.jar".


### Terms of use
This tool was created for pure goodness and not evil, so if
you agree to this terms of use you agree to use it for good
like testing you're compeny's works and training them to
fight against real social engineering in action. You also agree
by agreeing to this terms of use to not buy me a beer if you
see me in a bar, because it won't be me and thats because
I'm below 18. But if you see me in MacDonald's you would
have to buy me a MacBurger.

### Authors and Contributors
This tool was made by Yuval Gal(@yuvalgal51),
Add me on twitter! I'm databasehunter.
